17355.「来てくれたか <pc>……。\n キミのことを待っていた！:
You came <pc>... I've been waiting
for you!

17356.「リジン！！ 戦士たちを呼べ！\n これより軍議を行う！\n ただちに 作戦会議:
Rijin! Call the warriors! We will now hold a
war council! Gather in the war room
immediately!

17358.「<pc>！ まずは 朗報だ。\n ヴァルハラの戦士たちの はたらきにより\n:
<pc>! First, some good news. The work
of the Warriors of Valhalla has revealed the
whereabouts of one of the Three Wise Men!

17359.「三賢人とは 来たるべき最終戦争の際\n 我ら ヴァルハラの戦士と共に 立つとい:
The Three Wise Men are the crystallization of
wisdom that will stand with us, the warriors
of Valhalla, in the coming Final War.

17360.「彼らは それぞれ チカラと 愛 そして光を\n つかさどる賢人。こたび 居場所:
Each of them is a sage of power, love, and
light. Sage Thor, the Sage of Power, has now
been located.

17361.「……で その チカラの賢人トールは\n 巨人族が この世の楽園と呼ぶ\n 娯楽:
So, it turns out that Sage Thor, the man of
power, is on an island of amusement that the
Titans call Utopia.

17362.「ひとつ問題なのは その娯楽の島が\n 途方もなく 遠方の地だってことでして。\:
One problem is that the island of amusement is
a very remote place. Who should go to the
island of amusement...

17363.「賢人トールの 捜索にあたる人員は\n もう 決めてある。\n ボクと <pc>:
I've already assigned a team of men to search
for Sage Thor. Me and <pc> will go!

17364.「シグルド様 お考え直しを！！\n あなたは 我らヴァルハラの戦士を率いるお方。:
Master Sigurd, please reconsider! You are the
leader of the warriors of Valhalla. If
anything should happen to you...!

17366.「ボクは 皆を導く指導者として\n 巨人族の世界を 深く知っておく必要がある！\:
As a leader, I need to know more about the
world of the Titans! And you're going to stop
me from doing that?

17367.「……めっそうも ございません。\n では せめて お気をつけて\n いってくだ:
I'm sure that's not true. Well then, please be
careful at least.

17368.「さて 巨人族の戦士 <pc>よ！\n キミの役目は 先ほど話したとおりだ。:
Well, Titan Warrior <pc>! You are the
one I just told you about.

17369.「キミには このボクと ともに\n 娯楽の島に 行ってもらいたい！\n チカラの:
I want you to come with me to the Island of
Recreation! Let's go find Sage Thor!

17370.「心強い返事だ。巨人族である\n キミと一緒なら チカラの賢人トールも\n 必ず:
That's an encouraging reply. With you, a
Titan, I'm sure we'll find Sage Thor of
Chikara!

17371.「それでは すぐに 出発しよう！\n ボクは キミの かばんの中に入らせてもらう:
Then let's get going right away! I'm going to
go into your bag.

17374.「むっ！？ 待て <pc>！\n どうやら キミは 他にも\n 多数の使命を 抱:
Mwah! Wait <pc>! It appears you have
a multitude of other missions.

17375.「まずは その使命を まっとうしてくれ。\n それが戦士たる者の つとめであろう:
First of all, you must complete your mission.
That is the duty of a warrior.

17376.「そうか……。\n ならば 無理強いすることはできないな。\n キミにも 事情と:
Well then, I can't force you to do anything.
I'm sure you have your reasons.

17378.「巨人族の戦士 <pc>よ。\n 以前 話したとおり チカラの賢人トールの\n:
Titan Warrior <pc>. As I told you
before, the whereabouts of Sage Thor of
Chikara have been revealed.

17379.「キミには このボクと ともに\n 娯楽の島に 行ってもらいたい！\n チカラの:
I want you to come with me to the Island of
Recreation! Let's go find Sage Thor!

17380.かばんの中から シグルドの声が聞こえる。: I hear Sigurd's voice from inside his bag.

17381.「すばらしい……！\n ボクの想像を はるかに超えている！:
This is amazing. This is far beyond anything I
could have imagined!

17382.「この島が 巨人族の 娯楽の島！\n <pc>！ ボクは こんなに\n 美しい景:
This island is the recreation island of the
Titans! <pc>! I've never seen
anything so beautiful!

17384.「なんと 幸運なんだ！\n こんなに早く 見つかるとは！:
How lucky we are! I didn't expect to find you
so soon!

17385.「<pc>！ あの ご婦人を追ってくれ！\n 離れていても感じる チカラの波動…:
<pc>! Follow that lady! Even at a
distance, I can feel the surge of power...
that orange one is Sage Thor!

17386.「皆 待たせたな！\n ボクだ！ 今 帰ったぞ！！:
Hey, guys, what's taking so long? It's me! I'm
home!

17387.「おお……！\n この方が チカラの賢人トール様！\n なんという神々しき お姿:
Oh...! This is Sage Thor, the Sage of Power!
What a divine figure!

17388.「英知の結晶よ！ 我が声に 応えたまえ！: Crystals of wisdom! Answer my voice!

17389.「天命のもとに その英知を 捧げよ！\n 賢人トール！ その瞳に 光を！:
To the Lord's command, I offer your wisdom!
Sage Thor! Let light shine in your eyes!

17391.「賢人トール！！\n ようやく あなたに お会いできた！: Sage Thor! At last we meet you!

17392.「ふうむ…… 賢人トール……？\n ひさかたぶりに 我が名を呼ばれたわい。\n:
Hmm... Sage Thor...? It's been a long time
since anyone has called my name. You've been
asleep for a long time.

17393.「賢人トールよ あなたのチカラを借りたい！\n 天命の戦乙女が 連れ去られたため:
Sage Thor, we need your help! The Fate's War
Maiden has been taken, and the balance of the
world has begun to shift!

17394.「な なんじゃと！？ 天命の戦乙女が！？: What the hell? The Fate's War Maiden!

17395.「こうしては おれん。すぐに 我が占術で\n 残りの三賢人の居場所を 明らかにせ:
This is not the way it is for me. Soon I shall
use my divination to locate the remaining
three wise men, but for now, leave it to me.

17396.「<pc>。キミのおかげで\n 天命の戦乙女の奪還に向けて 大きな一歩を\n 踏:
<pc>. Thanks to you, we've taken a
giant step toward retrieving the Fate's War
Maiden. It's only a small thank you.

17397.「……そういえば キミには 天命の戦乙女の話を\n ほとんど したことがなかった:
Come to think of it, I've barely mentioned
Fate's War Maiden to you.

17398.「ボクは あの方に出会った日を 忘れはしない。\n あの日…… 敵の夜襲に倒れた:
I will never forget the day I met him. That day... the sun, which was not supposed to rise, appeared in front of me as I fell to the
enemy's night attack.

17399.<center>勇猛なる戦士 シグルドよ。\n目を 覚ましなさい……。: O Sigurd, the valiant warrior. Awake...

17400.<center>……戦いに散った あなたの魂は 尊きもの。\nこれからは ヴァル:
Your souls are precious, having been scattered
in battle. From now on, you will lead a new
life as a warrior of Valhalla...

17401.「そうして ボクは……\n 美しく気高い 天命の戦乙女に仕える\n ヴァルハラの:
And so I was reborn as a warrior of Valhalla
in the service of the beautiful and noble
Fate's War Maiden.

17402.「ボクの命は 天命の戦乙女のもの。\n 決して あの方を失うわけには いかないの:
My life belongs to Fate's War Maiden. I can
never lose her.

17403.「ありがとう <pc>。\n キミのおかげで チカラの賢人トールを\n 見つけだ:
Thank you <pc>. Thanks to you, I was
able to find Sage Thor of Chikara.

17404.「これで 天命の戦乙女の奪還に向けて\n ボクたちは 大きな一歩を 踏みだせたの:
With this, we have taken a big step toward the
retrieval of Fate's War Maiden.

17405.「今は 賢人トールが 占術を使って\n 残りの三賢人の居場所を 探してくれている:
For now, Sage Thor is using his divination
skills to locate the remaining three Sages.
Leave it to him and get some rest.
